metadata.title: Sebastian Alvarez | Full-Stack Software Engineer & Web Developer
metadata.description: Full-stack software engineer specializing in React, Next.js, Python, and cloud technologies. View my portfolio, projects, and technical blog on modern web development.
metadata.ogDescription: Explore my portfolio of web development projects and technical expertise in React, Next.js, and Python

why.title: Why Listerineh?
why.description: Beyond code and algorithms, I'm a passionate musician. {listerineh} is my artistic identity—where creativity meets sound, and the same problem-solving mindset I apply to software is expressed through music.
why.storyParagraph1: Music and software development share the same DNA—both require precision, creativity, and the ability to solve complex problems in elegant ways. What started in 2020 as a simple escape during the pandemic has evolved into something much deeper.
why.storyParagraph2: As Listerineh, I explore instrumental Lo-Fi Hip-Hop and experimental soundscapes that blend mellow vibes with nostalgia. Each track captures late-night thoughts and memories, crafted with the same attention to detail I bring to my engineering projects.
why.storyParagraph3: It's about creating meaningful auditory experiences that resonate with people—still exploring, still figuring things out, and inviting you to be part of the journey.
why.instrumentsDescription: Multiinstrumentalist with experience in rock bands
why.productionDescription: Blending instrumental depth with experimental soundscapes
why.inspirationList: Tech • Nature • Human Connection • Late-night Thoughts
why.inspirationDescription: Capturing emotions and memories through sound
why.visionDescription: Still exploring, still figuring things out
why.topTracksDescription: Listen to my top tracks and explore my music on Spotify. Each release is a journey through sound and emotion.
why.ctaDescription: Whether it's a software project or a musical collaboration, I'm always open to new opportunities. Let's build something meaningful together.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: This Privacy Policy explains how Sebastian Alvarez ("I", "me", or "my") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you visit listerineh.dev (the "Website").
privacy.autoCollectedText: When you visit the Website, I automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
privacy.pagesVisited: Pages visited and time spent on pages
privacy.cookiesText: I use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie preferences through the cookie banner or the {cookieSettings} link in the footer.
privacy.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help understand how visitors use the site (Vercel Analytics)
privacy.howUseText: I use the collected information to:
privacy.improveExperience: Improve user experience and website functionality
privacy.thirdPartyText: I use the following third-party services that may collect information:
privacy.vercelAnalyticsDesc: Website analytics (only if you accept analytics cookies)
privacy.thirdPartyPolicies: These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of your information.
privacy.dataRetentionText: Cookie consent preferences are stored for 365 days. Analytics data is retained according to Vercel's data retention policy. You can revoke consent at any time through Cookie Settings.
privacy.accessInfo: Access the personal information I hold about you
privacy.objectProcessing: Object to processing of your information
privacy.withdrawConsent: Withdraw consent for cookies at any time
privacy.childrenText: This Website is not intended for children under 13 years of age. I do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.changesText: I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated "Last updated" date at the top of this page.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact me through the {contactForm} on the website.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.agreementText: By accessing and using listerineh.dev (the "Website"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Website.
terms.licenseText: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials (information, blog posts, code examples) on the Website for personal, non-commercial viewing only.
terms.licenseNotAllowedTitle: This license does NOT allow you to:
terms.modifyMaterials: Modify or copy the materials without attribution
terms.commercialUse: Use the materials for commercial purposes without permission
terms.reverseEngineer: Attempt to reverse engineer any software on the Website
terms.removeCopyright: Remove any copyright or proprietary notations
terms.transferMaterials: Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" on another server
terms.blogContentText: All blog posts, articles, and written content on this Website are original works by Sebastian Alvarez unless otherwise stated.
terms.codeExamplesText: Code snippets and examples shared in blog posts are provided for educational purposes. You may use them in your projects with proper attribution. No warranty is provided for their use.
terms.disclaimerText1: The materials on the Website are provided on an 'as is' basis. I make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.disclaimerText2: I do not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on the Website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this Website.
terms.limitationsText: In no event shall Sebastian Alvarez or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on the Website.
terms.externalLinksText: The Website may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by me. I do not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites.
terms.userCommentsText: If you submit any content, feedback, or suggestions through the contact form or other means, you grant me a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and publish such content.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content on this Website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Sebastian Alvarez and is protected by international copyright laws.
terms.modificationsText: I may revise these Terms of Use at any time without notice. By using this Website, you agree to be bound by the current version of these Terms of Use.
terms.governingLawText: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of your jurisdiction, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
terms.contactInfoText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact me through the {contactForm}.
terms.noteText: By continuing to use this Website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and the {privacyPolicy}.

cookies.bannerDescription: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can choose which cookies to accept.
cookies.preferencesDescription: Choose which cookies you want to accept. You can change these settings at any time.
cookies.necessaryDescription: Required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookies.settingsDescription: Manage your cookie preferences. Changes will take effect after saving.
cookies.preferencesCookiesDescription: Remember your settings and preferences (e.g., theme, language).
